attributes.action: EU Referendum Was Fair. If it was so important why didn't people make the effort
attributes.additional_details: I am a first time voter. We are not raciest. Everyone knows you cant keep everyone happy. I no people don't like loosing. Being British WE are a proud country. We can make this work. I am just common man working hard to make my living in life. The businesses that leave the uk will loose more then we will. We can set up help for new businesses to corner what the leave behind. We are not Great Britian anymore, Please have faith in people and let us create The Greatness once again,
attributes.background: We did the EU Referendum fair,  We went out in the rain, the cold, and some storms to vote, Everyone new this would be a Very Big vote. 7am-10pm is a very long day for people to get out bed and make a effort. This was my first time voting and many people that had never voted got out bed.
